name: Yang Hansen

biography.story: Yang Hansen is a young center from Zibo, Shandong, China, standing 7'1" tall. He was selected by the Memphis Grizzlies in the 2025 NBA Draft and then traded to the Portland Trail Blazers. He is a rising star in Chinese basketball who achieved his NBA dream through outstanding performance in the CBA.
biography.background: Yang Hansen was born in Zibo, Shandong Province, and started playing basketball at a young age. He entered club training in third grade and later attended Zibo Sports School. Around 2020, he joined the youth system of Qingdao Guoxin Haitian Club.
biography.journey: Yang Hansen performed excellently in Qingdao Guoxin Haitian youth team, helping the team win U17 national championships for two consecutive years and earning individual honors. In 2023, he was promoted to the CBA first team and won multiple important honors in his first season, including CBA Rookie of the Year. In 2025, he successfully entered the NBA, starting a new chapter in his professional career.

careerTimeline.event: Joined Qingdao Guoxin Haitian Club youth system
careerTimeline.description: Entered the club's youth training system under invitation from Qingdao Guoxin Haitian Club

careerTimeline.event: Qingdao Guoxin Haitian youth team won U17 national championship
careerTimeline.description: Yang Hansen was named Best Defensive Player

careerTimeline.event: Qingdao Guoxin Haitian youth team defended U17 national championship
careerTimeline.description: Yang Hansen was named Most Valuable Player

careerTimeline.event: Joined Qingdao Eagles CBA first team
careerTimeline.description: In the 2023-24 CBA season, Yang Hansen was promoted to Qingdao Guoxin Aquatic Products first team to play professional games
On October 23, 2023, made professional debut in the first round of regular season against Beijing Beikong
In that season's All-Star Game, Yang Hansen was selected as North All-Star starter
CBA Domestic Player First Team, CBA Defensive Player of the Year, CBA Rookie of the Year

careerTimeline.event: Selected by Memphis Grizzlies in NBA Draft
careerTimeline.description: On June 25, 2025, selected 16th overall by Memphis Grizzlies in 2025 NBA Draft
After being drafted, traded to Portland Trail Blazers
On July 12, 2025, made team debut in Trail Blazers vs Golden State Warriors NBA Summer League game, playing less than 24 minutes with 10 points, 4 rebounds, 5 assists, 3 blocks and 1 steal

honors: CBA Defensive Player of the Year

senior.achievement: Made national team debut in 2025 Asia Cup Basketball qualifying match against Mongolia

corrections: Draft position: 2nd round 36th pick → 1st round 16th pick
Team: Indiana Pacers → Portland Trail Blazers
Draft team: Directly selected by Pacers → Selected by Grizzlies then traded to Trail Blazers
